column3: “Spicey, floral and sweet. This strain has the perfect high. The kind of high told about by older brothers. The purple haze of the mid 90's. This is the weed of legend. The kind of things men dreamed of creating. The magnum opus of generations past. The gift of heavens is Fighting Buddha.”
“I love this strain recommend this for the studio for its creative energetic prowess I wish there was 6 stars”
